ğŸŒŸ Copy Text from Image: Your Go-To Chrome Extension for Text Extraction

Transform your productivity with Copy Text from Image, the Chrome extension designed to extract text from pictures and videos with unmatched ease and precision. Whether itâ€™s a quick screenshot or a detailed document image, our tool uses advanced OCR technology to convert text in a picture to text, making it editable and ready to use.

Why Choose Copy Text from Image?

ğŸ‘† Effortless Highlighting: Just click to copy text from image; itâ€™s that simple to extract text from a picture.
ğŸ¯ Accurate OCR: Our extension reads text from images with high accuracy, ensuring that you can convert photo to text without errors.
ğŸ“‹ Clipboard Ready: Extracted words are immediately copied to your clipboard, making it easy to get text from image and use it right away.
ğŸŒ Versatile Use: Works on all websites, allowing you to copy text from image or even copy text from videos without restrictions.
ğŸ›¡ï¸ Privacy First: Operates offline within your browser, so you can read text from image securely without any data leaving your device.
â±ï¸ Quick Conversion: Transform picture to text or picture to words in moments, streamlining how you convert pic to text.

Supported File Formats:
The extension handles a variety of formats, ensuring flexibility:
- JPEG
- PNG
- BMP
- TIFF
- WEBP
- SVG

ğŸ”’ Privacy and Security:
Copy Text from Image prioritizes your privacy. All text recognition happens in your browser, with no external data transmission. Use this powerful text extractor with confidence, knowing your data stays yours.

ğŸš€ Easy Setup and Use:

Download Copy Text from Image from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to any image or video.
Click to select the text area and instantly copy text from image.
Enjoy immediately usable text through our seamless image text to text conversion.
ğŸ“ Ideal for Everyone:
From students to professionals, anyone needing to extract text from picture, copy text from videos, or simply convert text in a picture to text will find this tool invaluable.

ğŸ†˜ Support and Troubleshooting:
For assistance or feedback, contact our responsive development team at almovwork@gmail.com.

ğŸŒ Start Saving Time Today:
Download Copy Text from Image now and revolutionize how you interact with text in images and videos. Say goodbye to manual typing and hello to efficiency!
